column3: News;Phnom Penh:------ A British man was found ------dead------ on the 24th of November 2018 in a room on Street 70
column6: a 74-year-old British man was a tourist.------The cause of death is still unknown as police are investigating.------And at the scene
column7: they found the following items: 1. Passport  2. $ 20 dollars. 3. Luggage 4. Some clothes. 5. Identification card. ------The body was taken to Steung Meanchey pagoda.------WARNING: image of deceased in source link:------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/274207
